name: AWS SQS
natural_language_description: 这是 AWS SQS 节点。主要用于: Sends messages to AWS SQS

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: iam

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: sendMessage
available_options: Send Message (值: sendMessage) - Send a message to a queue

queue.name: queue
queue.description: Queue to send a message to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
queue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Queue Name or ID | 作用: Queue to send a message to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

queueType.name: queueType
queueType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Queue Type | 默认值: standard

sendInputData.name: sendInputData
sendInputData.description: Whether to send the data the node receives as JSON to SQS
sendInputData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Input Data | 作用: Whether to send the data the node receives as JSON to SQS | 默认值: True

message.name: message
message.description: Message to send to the queue
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: Message to send to the queue | (必填项)

messageGroupId.name: messageGroupId
messageGroupId.description: Tag that specifies that a message belongs to a specific message group. Applies only to FIFO (first-in-first-out) queues.
messageGroupId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message Group ID | 作用: Tag that specifies that a message belongs to a specific message group. Applies only to FIFO (first-in-first-out) queues. | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: delaySeconds (值: None) - How long, in seconds, to delay a message for
messageDeduplicationId (值: None) - Token used for deduplication of sent messages. Applies only to FIFO (first-in-first-out) queues.
